title: Yukon - Charley Rivers National Preserve: Mammals
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals     Mammals                 Mammals         NPS Photo by Greg Kinman  Yukon-Charley Rivers is home to many species of mammals and some of which are a unique portion of the world's population. Click on the links below to learn more about each species studied in the Preserve. Arctic Ground Squirrel Brown Bear Dall's Sheep Moose Snowshoe Hare  Wolves
